title: chrusso
author: chrusso
content: Hi everyone!I have around 40k usd and I'm looking for a 2 years investment.What is the safest bet in your opinion?- Bitcoin,- Ethereum, or- Solana?I'm expecting a 4x in avarage... Thank you!

comments.author: posi
comments.body: Quote from: chrusso on September 29, 2022, 08:27:27 PMHi everyone!I have around 40k usd and I'm looking for a 2 years investment.What is the safest bet in your opinion?- Bitcoin,- Ethereum, or- Solana?I'm expecting a 4x in avarage... Thank you!  Of course to say the safest is definitely bitcoin, not the other 2 options. There is no more secure coin than the bitcoin. But to say which coin can bring the most profit it can be ethereum or it can also be sol because bitcoin is safe but can't grow faster than the other 2 coins, on the contrary, the other 2 coins are not as safe as bitcoin. Risk and return always go hand in hand, so depending on your investment needs, you prefer safe or high return. Ethereum and sol are two potentially risky altcoins, so you should consider them carefully, just to be safe, I will put 30k in bitcoin and 10k in the other 2 coins.
